# __Hvac control systems__

## Risks linked to this technology

* [Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying sars-cov-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Risk/PBN__Risk_9113.md)
